Tangle Creations

About Us

Tangle Creations is a company known for its innovative and therapeutic sensory toys, particularly the TangleÂ® toy. The Tangle toy is a series of interconnected, curved segments that can be twisted, bent, and manipulated into various shapes and patterns. It was originally invented by Richard X. Zawitz in the 1980s. The Tangle toy was initially designed as a tool to help individuals improve their hand coordination and fine motor skills. However, it quickly gained popularity beyond its therapeutic applications and became a beloved fidget toy for people of all ages. Its tactile nature and endless possibilities for manipulation make it a satisfying and calming sensory experience for many.


Our Mission

The Tangle was created to inspire peace through creativity. Something magical happens when someone has a Tangle in their hands and it is our mission to spread the magic around the world!
